content: plain knit row round 16 * k2tog 3 times sm repeat from * 3 more times finishing cut the yarn and pass through remaining 12 stitches fold brim up 3 5 - 4 / 9 - 10 cm depending on desired amount of slouch and tack with a simple stitch at 4 evenly spaced intervals to hold in place weave in ends and enjoy your finished hat no need to block mouton noir page 2 - www espacetricot com - © espace tricot 2021 - for personal use only
